SMARTLED_EXT_DESCRIPTION: Extended WS2812 smart LED control blocks with brightness limiting and gamma correction.
STRIP_EXT_CONSTRUCTOR_MESSAGE0: create $[CONSTRUCTED_VAR_NAME] strip (ext) on pin $[LED_PIN] with $[LED_COUNT] LEDs of type $[LED_TYPE]
STRIP_EXT_CONSTRUCTOR_TOOLTIP: Create a new SmartLedExt strip with brightness limiting and gamma linearization support
STRIP_EXT_SET_ALL_MESSAGE0: set all LEDs of $[STRIP_INSTANCE] to color $[COLOR_RGB]
STRIP_EXT_SET_ALL_TOOLTIP: Set all LEDs in the strip to the given color
STRIP_EXT_MAX_BRIGHTNESS_TOOLTIP: Set the maximum brightness for the strip (0 = off, 255 = full)
STRIP_EXT_MAX_BRIGHTNESS_PERCENT_TOOLTIP: Set the maximum brightness as a percentage (0 = off, 100 = full)
STRIP_EXT_LINEARIZE_TOOLTIP: Enable or disable gamma correction for perceptually linear brightness steps on WS2812 / NeoPixel strips
